alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis; West Cameron (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Cameron, central Jefferson Davis, south central Beauregard and Calcasieu Parishes through 715 AM CDT... At 630 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Gillis to 7 miles southeast of Holly Beach. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Jennings, Cameron, Westlake, Welsh, Iowa, Fenton, Grand Lake, Hayes, Moss Bluff, Lacassine National Wildlife Refuge, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Grand Chenier, Hacketts Corner, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, Gillis, Holly Beach and Lowry. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 16 and 62. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beauregard; Calcasieu; East Cameron; Jefferson Davis; West Cameron
